thread.title: Grammys 2017: All the Celebrity Dresses From the Red Carpet
thread.title_full: Grammys 2017: All the Celebrity Dresses From the Red Carpet

title: Grammys 2017: All the Celebrity Dresses From the Red Carpet
text: 1 / 4 Grammys 2017: Fashion—Live From the Red Carpet Tonight’s the night! The 2017 Grammy Awards have arrived, and it’s sure to be one hell of a show. After all, you can expect a face-off between two of the most decorated women in the business (that’d be Beyoncé and Adele). Plus, there will be tributes to greats we lost, like Prince and George Michael. Before host James Corden takes the stage, celebrities will be walking the red carpet outside the Staples Center in Los Angeles. But on the fashion front, which turn will hit a sartorial high note? Follow along in real time, to see the stars—and what they are wearing—on music’s biggest night. We’ll be updating the photos as the event unfolds, so check back to make sure you don’t miss a beat. Or a dress. Previous
